Author: AsnBobaGirl
Text: My ghetto way of doing it is pour a little bit of the drink into my palm and taking my other finger and rubbing it between my finger and thumb. if it's sticky, it has sugar. You'll also have the backup test with your palm. If I'm in a rush, I typically just dip the tip of my finger into the drink and do the same thing with rubbing it.   I had to do this a lot with Coke / Diet Coke and vanilla / sugar free vanilla in the past and this typically works 100% lol.

Author: grossenten98
Text: Blood glucose monitor, or stickiness are the best ways to check
